mean_cn: n.女服务员；女主人；女主持人
mean_en: a woman who invites guests to a meal, a party, etc.; a woman who has people staying at her home; a woman who is employed to welcome and entertain men at a nightclub; a woman who introduces and talks to guests on a television or radio show; a woman who welcomes the customers in a restaurant
sentence: The air hostess brought a cup of coffee to the passenger.
sentence_trans: 空姐给乘客端上来一杯咖啡。
word_etyma: host主人 + ess女性，雌性 → 女主人
